name: Disposable Hoard
description:
Fight hoards, acquire monsters, and murder a very large pumpkin in this hoard-building halloween themed game!

This was meant to be a one week game jam game that unfortunately took two weeks to complete. Its a short hoard-growing game in which you need to amass a large fallowing of monsters in order to kill a giant pumpkin. WASD  or ARROW KEYS to move and SPACE to revive dead enemies. 

Let me know what you think in the comments!
